snippet: Seventeen police officers and forest officials in India have been convicted of gang raping a group of tribal villagers in the southern state of Tamil Nadu in 1992.
lead_paragraph: Seventeen police officers and forest officials in India have been convicted of gang raping a group of tribal villagers in the southern state of Tamil Nadu in 1992.

headline.main: India: 17 Officials Are Convicted in 1992 Gang Rape and Beatings
headline.print_headline: India: 17 Officials Are Convicted In 1992 Gang Rape and Beatings
